queries.name: quantized_cosine
queries.query: SELECT TOP 6 c.text, VectorDistance(c.embedding, @testData_searchVector) AS SimilarityScore FROM c ORDER BY VectorDistance(c.embedding, @testData_searchVector)

queries.name: flat_euclidean
queries.query: SELECT TOP 6 c.text, VectorDistance(c.embedding, @testData_searchVector) AS SimilarityScore FROM c ORDER BY VectorDistance(c.embedding, @testData_searchVector)

queries.name: diskann_dotproduct
queries.query: SELECT TOP 6 c.text, VectorDistance(c.embedding, @testData_searchVector) AS SimilarityScore FROM c ORDER BY VectorDistance(c.embedding, @testData_searchVector)
